name: Dong Hoon Lee 0001
content: Embedded Security Lab.Search this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationEmbedded Security Lab. (EMSEC)School of Cybersecurity, Korea UniversityOverviewWelcome to EMSEC at the School of Cybersecurity, Korea University, Republic of Korea. In the early 2010s, with the emergence of smartphones as a developing technology, Prof. Lee and his team began exploring the associated security chalenges.This led to the founding of EMSEC with a shared interest in security. In 2023, Prof. Choi joined EMSEC, and he now co-supervises EMSEC together with Prof. Lee.  Today, EMSEC is a dynamic team of researchers who are interested in advancing security reseach across a wide range of topics, including automotive security, drone security, robot security, SW security, and more.Latest NewsOur paper (Hee Yeon Kim, Gyunghoon Kim, Dong Hoon Lee, and Wonsuk Choi, BTreeFuzz: Enhanced Feedback Mechanism for ROS Program Fuzzer Based on Behavior Tree) has been accepeted at ICSE 2026.김의진 연구원 won the best paper at CISC-W '25 (차세대우수여성과학자상)Our Paper (Sunwoo Lee and Wonsuk Choi, Eyes on Your Typing: Snooping Finger Motions on Virtual keyboards) has been accepted at IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy 2025 Our team has been awarded a new research project funded by the NRF (우수신진연구), `25.03 ~ `30.02 Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
